review: use it all the time. Couldn't be easier and so nice to have the option of movies or series.
author: Marty

review: Easy to set-up and the price is very reasonable.
author: judy

review: It was much more difficult to set up than advertised.  But once I got it working, I love it.  The content is great!
author: Big Aunt Sal "samc"

review: I liked it for the couple months it did work. HDMI gave out and the stick gets super hot, The last time I tried, I can plug it into a computer, even ADB bridge can get screen shots out of it, unfortunately it no longer displays on the multiple tv's I tried it on. They want me to call them but I don't think I will have time, I plan on building my own tiny media center like stick in the future, I can only pray it lasts longer than this fire stick did.
author: Internet User

review: I can't seem to get it to work. I am not a tech-ki person maybe thats the problem. I hope I can work it out and come back and give you a final "BRAVO" review
author: gloria fernandez "Dr. Fernandez"

review: GREAT PRODUCT! I like this it gives me NO COMMERCIAL TV and a lot more selections than dish.cable etc...
author: Kyle W.

review: We're enjoying the Fire Stick.  Super easy to use & responsive remote.
author: Periwinkle

review: Very easy to setup and operate...I like it!
author: JACK WALKER

review: Love all of the things I can access with this device.
author: Sarah
